A minimalist developer-friendly shell prompt for fish shell ## Install ```fish $ omf install pie $ omf theme pie ``` ## Features * üé® Native colors (changes with your preferences) * ‚è∞ Human readable execution time of last command * üìÇ Shortened cwd * ‚úÖ Last status success * üîÅ Git status - Current branch - Untracked files `?` - Stashed changes `$` - Dirty working directory `‚óè` - Staged files `‚®Ø` - Upstream status `ü†ã`, `ü†â` ## Screenshot
